input: Send a batch of requests for users with IDs 789012 and 234567, focusing on operational management and business process details.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts?$filter=CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements/PartyID eq '789012'&$select=OperationalBankContractManagement,BusinessProcessChainAssignment HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts?$filter=CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements/PartyID eq '234567'&$select=OperationalBankContractManagement,BusinessProcessChainAssignment HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
